article_title: 2 Arrested, 35 Ticketed At Underage Drinking Party
article_text:
Hayti, SD

A man and woman are facing charges after law enforcement broke up a large underage drinking party over the weekend in Hamlin County.

Officers ticketed 35 people ranging in age from 14 to 18 for underage consumption at the house party in Hayti.

An ambulance crew transported one person to the hospital for treatment of alcohol-related medical problems.

Officers arrested the 32-year-old man who owns the home and a 19-year-old woman.

They're charged with contributing to the delinquency of a minor, furnishing alcohol to minors and maintaining a house of nuisance.
